item.title: Ten best beaches to Travel Solo in India?
item.description: Traveling solo can be a rewarding experience, offering freedom and the opportunity for self-discovery. Here are ten of the best beaches in India for solo travelers: Palolem Beach, Goa Known for its stunning crescent shape and calm waters, Palolem is perfect for a peaceful solo retreat. The friendly vibe and numerous cafes make it easy to meet other travelers. Varkala Beach, Kerala Varkala
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
